about.title: About
about.content:
##### [TidyCards](https://www.tidy.cards) is a web application that allows you to easily organize and share your links! Whether articles, videos, tweets or any kinds of content.

You have dozens of folders of bookmarks and it's a mess? Create a collection: set a title, a description, an image and then add your links. You can also add a comment. So you will easily find back your favorite sites.

But why go through so many steps? [TidyCards](https://www.tidy.cards) is not only about yourself. You can also share your collections with whole world.

The heart of [TidyCards](https://www.tidy.cards) is the knowledge sharing, a kind of collective intelligence: share your research, your discoveries, your hobbies even things that shock or revolt you.

This sharing works in both ways: thanks to the search feature and the [Discover](https://www.tidy.cards/discover) page, where you will find the collections created by passionate people on the other side of the world.

On [TidyCards](https://www.tidy.cards) you don't have to search for hours the most relevant websites about your favorite theme, someone has probably already dug the topic.

And if not, [join us](https://www.tidy.cards/signin;mode=signup) now and create a collection.
